title: Add Points Manually to Loyalty Account
description: A customer forgot to use their loyalty card during a previous purchase. A customer service agent needs to add the points manually.

tasks.description: Look up the customer's loyalty account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the correct account.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's previous purchase using their receipt.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms the sale and calculates the points that should have been earned.

tasks.description: Manually add the calculated points to the customer's account with a note explaining the reason.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer's point balance is corrected.
